title: Angular "loader" icon keeps spinning and is chopped in half
description:
When an HTTP request returns a 404, the "loading" spinner doesn't stop spinning. This can be seen particularly on the dataimport tab when no handler is configured.

Also, the loader spinner is chopped in half vertically.
